mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(USER_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as userRegDate, USER_NAME as userName, USER_NICKNAME as userNick, USER_PHO_NUM as userPhoneNum, USER_EMAIL as userEmail, USER_BIRTH as userBirth, USER_SEX as userSex, USER_AREA as userArea, USER_ACT as userAct, USER_BLOG as userBlog, USER_INSTA as userInsta, USER_YOUTU as userYoutube, USER_TIKTOK as userTiktok, USER_ETC as userETC, USER_ADDRESS as userAddress, USER_VISIT_CNT as userVisitCnt, USER_HIS_CNT as userhisCnt, USER_BAN_CNT as userBanCnt, USER_CAN_CNT as userCancelCnt, USER_SCORE as userScore, USER_DELYN as userDelYN FROM pub_user

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(BUSS_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as bussRegDate, BUSS_NAME as bussName, BUSS_NICKNAME as bussNick, BUSS_PHO_NUM as bussPhoneNum, BUSS_EMAIL as bussEmail, BUSS_PW as bussPW, BUSS_BIRTH as bussBirth, BUSS_SEX as bussSex, BUSS_VISIT_CNT as bussVisitCnt, BUSS_BAN_CNT as bussBanCnt, BUSS_SCORE as bussScore, BUSS_DELYN as bussDelYN FROM pub_buss
